Posts.Content: Nov 23, 2015 10:59PM lindaontario wrote: i am on Herceptin been on it since March first with chemo and now alone I have a dull achy feeling this time for about 10 days after the Herceptin now it is gone but I take Herceptin again in 4 days see how it goes this time. Mine is over the 30 minutes but i'll put up with the pain to get it over with in a short time not a big fan of sitting there for 90 minutes unless it gets to much for me.
Posts.Title: Herceptin and pain jumbledbamboo lindaontario
